description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6d3aq","text":"This protocol describes the denaturation of PI3KC3-C1, and subsequent analysis of eluted nucleotides by electrospray ionization mass spec. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"7bdja","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50cs8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brpki","text":"PI3KC3-C1(VPS15-TSF) and PI3KC3-C1(mCherry-ATG14|VPS15-TSF) protein samples","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b55ec","text":"5 mL PD-10 column (Cytiva)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ou0i","text":"0.5 M NH4CH3CO2 buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":8,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":14,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51oct","text":"Nanodrop spectrophotometer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90v02","text":"Liquid chromatography (LC) system (Agilent 1200 series)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46qop","text":"LTQ-Orbitrap-XL mass spectrometer with ESI source (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"innp","text":"Ammonium acetate (≥98% purity)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9v32l","text":"Methanol (Optima LC-MS grade, ≥99.9% purity)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cthb2","text":"Purified water (resistivity of 18.2 MΩ·cm)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4t25","text":"Ultra C18 column (length: 150 mm, inner diameter: 2.1 mm, particle size: 3 µm)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vko8","text":"Pierce LTQ ESI positive ion calibration solution (Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da7i0","text":"Xcalibur software (version 2.0.7, Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c2kma","text":"Wash a   desalting (PD-10) column with   NH4CH3CO2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":43,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":46,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":49,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ljq6","text":"Load PI3KC3-C1(VPS15-TSF) and PI3KC3-C1(mCherry-ATG14|VPS15-TSF) protein samples onto a 5-mL PD-10 column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84vqi","text":"Exchange the protein sample buffer by passing the protein through the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft86e","text":"Heat the buffer-exchanged protein samples to   for   to denature the proteins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8lf5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"90","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blf6r","text":"After denaturation, centrifuge the samples at   to separate out any precipitated protein.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"21000","duration":900,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ukgg","text":"Measure the A260 absorbance of the denatured samples using a Nanodrop spectrophotometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btkqm","text":"Connect the LC system (Agilent 1200 series) to the LTQ-Orbitrap-XL mass spectrometer equipped with an ESI source (Thermo Fisher Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75kik","text":"Equilibrate the Ultra C18 column with the LC mobile phase solvents according to the manufacturer's instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8usi","text":"Prepare mobile phase solvents A and B:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dr4d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tmd1","text":"Solvent A: Water with   ammonium acetate.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jd25","text":"Solvent B: Methanol with   ammonium acetate.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6leff","text":"Set up the LC system with the following gradient program:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cijma","text":"Isocratic flow at 0.5% (volume/volume) B for  .\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bqru","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqqr7","text":"Linear gradient to 99.5% B over  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehkue","text":"Isocratic flow at 99.5% B for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sh6n","text":"Linear gradient to 0.5% B over  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6clq7","text":"Isocratic flow at 0.5% B for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"al9lq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1050,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7fjm2","text":"Maintain a flow rate of  /min and a column temperature of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"40","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"924f8","text":"Inject   of the sample into the LC system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2rtva","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"hd2k","text":"Perform external mass calibration in the positive ion mode using the Pierce LTQ ESI positive ion calibration solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apl1l","text":"Acquire full-scan, high-resolution mass spectra in the positive ion mode over the range of mass-to-charge ratio (m/z) = 300 to 1000 using the Orbitrap mass analyzer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4u28i","text":"Set the mass resolution to 60,000 (at m/z = 400, FWHM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jbn1","text":"Analyze the acquired data using Xcalibur software (version 2.0.7, Thermo Fisher Scientific) for peak identification and interpretation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
